idea-plugin.name: Advanced Nesting
idea-plugin.description:
Nest directories under files with matching names in the project tree view.

Organizes your codebase with Rails/Laravel-style concern patterns:

  • User.php + User/ directory → directory nests under file
  • Makes concern directories collapsible under their parent files
  • Cleaner project tree for domain-driven design patterns

Features:

  • Configurable file extensions (Settings → Editor → Advanced Nesting)
  • Case-insensitive matching
  • Lightweight and performant
